ComicInfo.Summary: Trashed! - Part 4: Chas frees Zoe from the Yalafath. Teddy Worthington presses Sam Skillings to clean up the Chas situation. Mercenaries raid the New Texas settlement. Chas discovers a Russian nuclear satellite. Zoe's comrades find her and they attack Chas.
ComicInfo.Title: Trashed! - Part 4
